metadata.title: CVE-2019-5799 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect inheritance of a new document's policy in Content Security Policyin Google Chrome prior to 73.0.3683.75 allowed a remote attacker to bypasscontent security policy via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
